revised_title: On the Ratio of Specific Heats of Paraffins and their Monohalogen Derivatives
tldr: The author investigates the ratio of specific heats in paraffins and their monohalogen derivatives, aiming to gain insights into the kinetic theory of gases and the configuration of molecules. The study uses the velocity of sound method and provides experimental data for various gases, including paraffins and their monohalogen derivatives.
